data.title: Tommy Davidson – You Show Me
data.meta_description: Tommy Davidson’s exceptional range–from stand-up comedy and acting to versatile music accomplishments–have earned him a reputation as an extraordinary performer who delivers no matter the arena. Best known as one of the stars of the hit television shows In Living Color, Davidson's Visibility Has allowed him to become a household name known for his innovative…
data.text:
Tommy Davidson’s exceptional range–from stand-up comedy and acting to versatile music accomplishments–have earned him a reputation as an extraordinary performer who delivers no matter the arena. Best known as one of the stars of the hit television shows In Living Color, Davidson’s Visibility Has allowed him to become a household name known for his innovative talent across all platforms. After being spotted by major concert promoters, he was first booked as the opening act for Patti LaBelle, Kenny G and Luther Vandross.

Producer: Wendell Donald Jr.

Co producer: Tommy Davidson

Co producer: James Moody

Patrick Bolton, Lynne Fiddmont, Selina Albright: Vocals

Najee: Flute/Sax

Marcus Anderson: Flute

Cory Baker: Bass Guitar

Rick Marcel: Guitar

Jaco Abel: Flamenco Guitar

Andrew Neu: Horn Arrangement

Arthur Thompson: Percussion

Frankie: Drums Programming

Mixed by Steve Sykes

Original song written by: Michael McDonald and Harry Garfield
